All Classes

Class
Description
Alerts
This entity contains properties for alerts and initialize automatically id, createdDate, updatedDate and deleted properties.
AlertsController
This class provides REST request for alerts.
AlertsRepository
This repository uses for alert processes on database.
AlertsService
AlertsService provides receive, update and delete alerts.
ApplicationMainClass
This class runs the spring application
AuthController
This class provides REST request for user processes.
LoginRequest
This entity designed for users login requests.
MailService
This service includes methods for sending alarm e-mails to users.
MarketController
This class provides REST request for stock values.
PasswordHashing
This class provides hashing passwords.
SoftDeleteRequest
This entity designed for soft delete processes.
StockController
This class provides REST request for stocks.
StockMarketView
This entity is designed for the page where all stocks will be displayed.
StockModel
This entity contains properties for stocks and initialize automatically id, createdDate, updatedDate and deleted properties.
StockRepository
This repository uses for stock processes on database.
StockService
StockService provides receive, update and delete stocks.
StockSymbolAndPrice
This entity is designed for control all alerts belongs to a stock.
StockValues
This entity is designed to hold all the detailed data of a stock.
StockValueService
This service includes methods that return values of one stock or all stocks.
UpdateAlertRequest
This entity designed for update alerts values.
UpdatePasswordRequest
This entity designed for update user password.
UpdateStocksValues
This component updates stock prices every 15 seconds.
UpdateUserRequest
This entity designed for update user values.
User
This entity contains properties for stocks and initialize automatically id, createdDate, updatedDate and deleted properties.
UserController
This class provides REST request for alerts.
UserRepository
This repository uses for user processes on database.
UserService
UserService provides receive, update and delete users.
